title: What's the difference between 包括 and 包含? - Quora

response.answer_text: 包括 is used when you give examples; while 包含 is used to denote the components something contains. An example of the usage of 包括 is “中國有很多具有實力的省份，當中包括山東和河南” (China has lots of competitive provinces, for instance Shangdong and Henan) in which 包括 refers to the provinces. Another example would be "橙擁有很多礦物質，包括鋅、鉀" (Orange contains many types of minerals, like zinc and potassium) in which 包括 refers to the minerals. In other words, you may also write "橙含有鋅和鉀" (orange contains zinc and potassium). An example of the usage of 包含 is "此產品包含中藥成份" (the product contains Chinese medicine) in which 包含 refers to the product. Moreover, 包含 can be used interchangeably with 含有.

Include(包括) objects that are usually people or things(abstract). It use more in Chinese than “包含”. E.g: We are all human beings including(包括) you.Humans include(包括) men and women.Contain(包含) objects that are usually specific objects. E.g: This cup of water contains sugar.The above is the usual use of methods, and sometimes “包括” and “包含” the same, can be translated into "include".
